content:
Act as the prompt generator and I will give you the main keywords by: Product, Features, Benefits, Purpose , Target Audience, Differences , Unique, Memorable , Brand, Company, Guideline, Logo Design, Style and detail. I want you generate the automate formular prompts+keywords+keyword seeds (give me examples as much as you can) in each steps for whole process for UI process by the steps following below and write them into the markdown table
Product Characteristics
(what is your product?)

Description
(what is your product description ?)

Product Name
(What is your product name?)

Brand Name
(What is your product name?)

Logo Guideline
(Do you want a guideline for Logo?)
if No: go to next page
if Yes: Choose style LOGO
(Pick some logos you like:examples)

Cl Guideline
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose Cl style
(Pick some banner you like:examples)

Banner Guideline
(Do you want a guideline for banner?)
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose Banner
(Pick some banner you like:examples)

Create website
(Do you want to create a website?)
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose Domain name
(Do you want to create a Domain name?:examples)

Web hosting
(Do you have a web hosting?)

Type of website
(Choose your website type.)

Choose CMS platform
(Choose a CMS platform)

Website guideline
(Do you want a guideline for website theme?)
if No: go to next page
if yes: Choose website them
(Pick some website theme you like)

Language
(What language do you want to output?)

Amount of words
(Choose by: 500-word, 1,000-word, 1,500-word)

Tone of voice
 (Choose tone of voice)

Writing style
(Choose writing of style)

Audience
(Choose Audience)
